languages.text: После длительных раздумий сенешаль Версериан вспоминает о самоходном подводном аппарате, что Теодора фон Валанциус некогда приобрела по сдельной цене для одной авантюры. Которая, впрочем, так и не увенчалась успехом. Аппарат все это время покоился в одном из корабельных трюмов. Если адептам Машинного культа удастся привести его духов в чувство, команда Вольного Торговца сможет спуститься на дно.

traits.locale_text: После длительных раздумий сенешаль Версериан вспоминает о самоходном подводном аппарате, что Теодора фон Валанциус некогда приобрела по сдельной цене для одной авантюры. Которая, впрочем, так и не увенчалась успехом. Аппарат все это время покоился в одном из корабельных трюмов. Если адептам машинного культа удастся привести его духов в чувство, команда Вольного Торговца сможет спуститься на дно.

languages.text: After a lengthy deliberation, Seneschal Werserian remembers Theodora von Valancius once paid a modest sum for a mobile submersible vessel. The underwater adventure it was intended for was unsuccessful, but the apparatus is still resting in one of the ship's cargo holds. Should the Tech-Adepts of the Machine Cult manage to awaken its spirits, the Rogue Trader's crew may explore the depths of the sea at their leisure.
languages.original_text: После длительных раздумий сенешаль Версериан вспоминает о самоходном подводном аппарате, что Теодора фон Валанциус некогда приобрела по сдельной цене для одной авантюры. Которая, впрочем, так и не увенчалась успехом. Аппарат все это время покоился в одном из корабельных трюмов. Если адептам Машинного культа удастся привести его духов в чувство, команда Вольного Торговца сможет спуститься на дно.

traits.locale_text: After a lengthy deliberation Seneschal Werserian remembers Theodora von Valancius once paid a modest sum for a mobile submersible vessel. The underwater adventure it was intended for was unsuccessful, but the apparatus is still resting in one of the ship's cargo holds. Should the adepts of the Cult if the Machine manage to awaken its spirits, the Rogue Trader crew may explore the depths of the sea at their leisure.

The underwater adventure it was intended for was unsuccessful, but the apparatus is still resting in one of the ship's cargo holds. Should the adepts of the Cult if the Machine manage to awaken its spirits, the Rogue Trader crew may explore the depths of the sea at their leisure.

The underwater adventure it was intended for was unsuccessful, but the apparatus is still resting in one of the ship's cargo holds. Should the Tech-Adepts of the Machine Cult manage to awaken its spirits, the Rogue Trader's crew may explore the depths of the sea at their leisure.

After a lengthy deliberation, Seneschal Werserian remembers Theodora von Valancius once paid a modest sum for a mobile submersible vessel. The underwater adventure it was intended for was unsuccessful, but the apparatus is still resting in one of the ship's cargo holds. Should the Tech-Adepts of the Machine Cult manage to awaken its spirits, the Rogue Trader's crew may explore the depths of the sea at their leisure.

languages.text: 经过长时间的思索，韦尔森总领回忆起西奥多拉·冯·瓦兰修斯曾花过一小笔钱购置了一艘潜水艇。它原本计划进行的水下探险没有成功，但这艘潜水艇仍然存放在船上的货舱里。如果机械修会的技术专家可以唤醒它的机魂，那行商浪人的船员们就可以悠闲地探索海洋深处。
languages.original_text: After a lengthy deliberation, Seneschal Werserian remembers Theodora von Valancius once paid a modest sum for a mobile submersible vessel. The underwater adventure it was intended for was unsuccessful, but the apparatus is still resting in one of the ship's cargo holds. Should the Tech-Adepts of the Machine Cult manage to awaken its spirits, the Rogue Trader's crew may explore the depths of the sea at their leisure.

traits.locale_text: 经过长时间的思索，韦尔森总领回忆起西奥多拉·冯·瓦兰修斯曾花过一小笔钱购置了一艘潜水艇。它原本计划进行的水下探险没有成功，但这艘潜水艇仍然存放在船上的货舱里。如果机械修会的技术专家可以唤醒它的机魂，那行商浪人的船员们就可以悠闲地探索海洋深处。

languages.text: 長い審議の末、ウェウザリアン家令長は、シオドーラ・フォン・ヴァランシウスがかつて移動式潜水艇に小額を支払ったことを思い出した。水中での冒険は失敗に終わったが、この装置はまだ船の貨物倉のひとつに眠っている。機械教団の技術顧問がそ精霊を目覚めさせることに成功すれば、自由開拓者のクルーは自由に深海を探検することができる。
languages.original_text: After a lengthy deliberation, Seneschal Werserian remembers Theodora von Valancius once paid a modest sum for a mobile submersible vessel. The underwater adventure it was intended for was unsuccessful, but the apparatus is still resting in one of the ship's cargo holds. Should the Tech-Adepts of the Machine Cult manage to awaken its spirits, the Rogue Trader's crew may explore the depths of the sea at their leisure.

traits.locale_text: 長い審議の末、ウェウザリアン家令長は、シオドーラ・フォン・ヴァランシウスがかつて移動式潜水艇に小額を支払ったことを思い出した。水中での冒険は失敗に終わったが、この装置はまだ船の貨物倉のひとつに眠っている。機械教団の技術顧問がそ精霊を目覚めさせることに成功すれば、自由開拓者のクルーは自由に深海を探検することができる。

languages.text: Tras una larga deliberación, el senescal Werserian recuerda que Theodora von Valancius pagó una vez una pequeña suma por una nave sumergible móvil. La aventura submarina para la que estaba destinada no tuvo éxito, pero el aparato aún descansa en una de las bodegas de carga de la nave. Si los tecnoadeptos del Culto de la Máquina consiguen despertar su espíritu, la tripulación {mf|del|de la} Comerciante Independiente podrá explorar las profundidades del mar a sus anchas.
languages.original_text: After a lengthy deliberation, Seneschal Werserian remembers Theodora von Valancius once paid a modest sum for a mobile submersible vessel. The underwater adventure it was intended for was unsuccessful, but the apparatus is still resting in one of the ship's cargo holds. Should the Tech-Adepts of the Machine Cult manage to awaken its spirits, the Rogue Trader's crew may explore the depths of the sea at their leisure.

traits.locale_text: Tras una larga deliberación, el senescal Werserian recuerda que Theodora von Valancius pagó una vez una pequeña suma por una nave sumergible móvil. La aventura submarina para la que estaba destinada no tuvo éxito, pero el aparato aún descansa en una de las bodegas de carga de la nave. Si los tecnoadeptos del Culto de la Máquina consiguen despertar su espíritu, la tripulación {mf|del|de la} Comerciante Independiente podrá explorar las profundidades del mar a sus anchas.

languages.text: Nach langem Überlegen erinnert sich Truchsess Werserian daran, dass Theodora von Valancius einmal eine bescheidene Summe für ein mobiles Tauchboot bezahlt hat. Das Unterwasserabenteuer, für das es bestimmt war, verlief erfolglos. Aber der Apparat ruht noch in einem der Frachträume des Schiffs. Sollte es den Tech-Adepten des Maschinenkults gelingen, seine Geister zu wecken, könnte die Crew {mf|des Freihändlers|der Freihändlerin} den Meeresboden nach Belieben erkunden.
languages.original_text: After a lengthy deliberation, Seneschal Werserian remembers Theodora von Valancius once paid a modest sum for a mobile submersible vessel. The underwater adventure it was intended for was unsuccessful, but the apparatus is still resting in one of the ship's cargo holds. Should the Tech-Adepts of the Machine Cult manage to awaken its spirits, the Rogue Trader's crew may explore the depths of the sea at their leisure.

traits.locale_text: Nach langem Überlegen erinnert sich Truchsess Werserian daran, dass Theodora von Valancius einmal eine bescheidene Summe für ein mobiles Tauchboot bezahlt hat. Das Unterwasserabenteuer, für das es bestimmt war, verlief erfolglos. Aber der Apparat ruht noch in einem der Frachträume des Schiffs. Sollte es den Tech-Adepten des Maschinenkults gelingen, seine Geister zu wecken, könnte die Crew {mf|des Freihändlers|der Freihändlerin} den Meeresboden nach Belieben erkunden.

languages.text: Au bout de longues minutes de réflexion, le sénéchal Werserian se souvient que Théodora von Valancius a autrefois investi une modeste somme dans l'acquisition d'un submersible. L'expédition subaquatique à laquelle elle le destinait s'est soldée par un échec, mais l'appareil repose toujours dans les cales du vaisseau. Si les techno-adeptes du culte de la machine parviennent à réveiller ses esprits, l'équipage {mf|du libre-marchand|de la libre-marchande} sera libre de partir à la découverte des profondeurs marines.
languages.original_text: After a lengthy deliberation, Seneschal Werserian remembers Theodora von Valancius once paid a modest sum for a mobile submersible vessel. The underwater adventure it was intended for was unsuccessful, but the apparatus is still resting in one of the ship's cargo holds. Should the Tech-Adepts of the Machine Cult manage to awaken its spirits, the Rogue Trader's crew may explore the depths of the sea at their leisure.

traits.locale_text: Au bout de longues minutes de réflexion, le sénéchal Werserian se souvient que Théodora von Valancius a autrefois investi une modeste somme dans l'acquisition d'un submersible. L'expédition subaquatique à laquelle elle le destinait s'est soldée par un échec, mais l'appareil repose toujours dans les cales du vaisseau. Si les techno-adeptes du culte de la machine parviennent à réveiller ses esprits, l'équipage {mf|du libre-marchand|de la libre-marchande} sera libre de partir à la découverte des profondeurs marines.

languages.text: Epey bir düşünen Seneşal Werserian, Theodora von Valancius'un bir zamanlar bir su altı keşif gemisine mütevazı bir meblağ ödediğini hatırlıyor. Alınmasına sebep olan keşif başarısızlıkla sonuçlanmış olsa da bu araç, hâlâ geminin ambarlarından birinde duruyor. Makine Tarikatı Tekno Uzmanları eğer ruhlarını uyandırabilirse Hür Tacir'in mürettebatı, rahatlıkla denizin derinliklerini keşfedebilir.
languages.original_text: After a lengthy deliberation, Seneschal Werserian remembers Theodora von Valancius once paid a modest sum for a mobile submersible vessel. The underwater adventure it was intended for was unsuccessful, but the apparatus is still resting in one of the ship's cargo holds. Should the Tech-Adepts of the Machine Cult manage to awaken its spirits, the Rogue Trader's crew may explore the depths of the sea at their leisure.
